ithin pasugiya nowambar 9 wanida thibunu me samuluwata amerikanu hitapu janadhipathi bil klintange biriya hilari klintan, supiri holiwud nili anjalina joli, amerikawe hitapu rajya lekam kondalisa rayis, lowa labalathama nobel sammanalabhini malala yusufsayi wage ayath sahabhagi wela thibuna.

nithara basratha polowe gatimen eewaye amathara kotaswalata hani siduwe.mema bas nawathumpale magi janathawa bassawimata ha nanwa ganimata widhimath wada piliwelak nomathi nisa magi janathawa dadi apahasuthawayanta muhuna pathi.paudgalika bas sewawan kriyathmaka wi wasara thihak ikma gos thibiyadiwath mathugama pradhana nagarayata paudgalika basratha nawathumpolak idikirimata nohakiwa athi bawa pradeshawasihu kiyathi.mema basratha gala thara ho kronkrit dama wahana gamana gamanayata ha magi janathawata awidagena yamata sudusu paridi sakaskara dena lesa pradeshawasihu adala baladharingen illimak karathi..
